string-array.name: fullchangelog
string-array.item: @array/v58
@array/v57

string-array.name: v58
string-array.item: fiftyeight
If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES! NO SUPPORT GIVEN TO NON-REBOOTED DEVICES AFTER UPDATE!!!
Final clean up and optimization build, ironed out most if not all bugs!
Fix calculator for 5.0.2 with white digit background
Fix Gmail Draft Edit Icon
Theme Device Control icon in Nameless Rom
Update Dialer for 5.1 to target unreadable in-call dialer text
Fix Manual Setup for Gmail
Theme Hangouts Invite Background (Remove the blue)
No updates for a week or two, going on a vacation!

string-array.name: v57
string-array.item: fiftyseven
HAPPY 100TH! THIS BUILD NOW HAS 100 APP OVERLAYS!
If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES! NO SUPPORT GIVEN TO NON-REBOOTED DEVICES AFTER UPDATE!!!
Any problems, try reinstalling, as this package has a TON of new mods compared to before.
Huge cleaning build, mainly under the hood, testing and optimization
Status Bar, Power Menu, Nav Bar and Settings has new minimal icons
New animated toggles!
Fixed pattern registration default color
[BLISS] New Bliss Logos used system wide, Status Bar, About Phone
Theme Android Terminal
Theme TeleService for 5.0.2 and 5.1, quick reply messages.
Theme TextSecure Fab icon (request)
Remove dark overlay for G+, instead, replacing with FB style black borders.
Revert "Whiten Hangouts Video Call Icon"
Enlarge QS Icon Size
Change Holo background gradient to pure black
Theme Screen Pinning FAB in Recents
Theme Screen Pinning Dialog (5.1)
Theme Google Play Games and Google Play Services
Add BetterBatteryStats Paid Version Theme
Add Google Services Themed
Finalize Calculator Theme
Make the Gmail Double Arrow Whiter!
